title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 180.6 - Treatment of commercials with dual expenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 180.6 - Treatment of commercials with dual expenses

State Regulations
A qualified commercial may incur expenses in both the upstate
and downstate component programs. In the event that this occurs, the department
shall apply expenses incurred geographically in upstate to the upstate program
and expenses incurred geographically downstate to the downstate
program. Notes

Amended

New

York State Register January 22, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 03, eff. 1/22/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
